spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lamia's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lamia makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its dagger or Intoxicating Touch.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Intoxicating Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}The target is magically cursed for 1 hour. Until the curse ends, the target has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws and all ability checks.
